sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Check Business Process Outcome</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[    var gt = new GlideRecord('x_hsb11_hsbc_mss_o_business_process_stage');
    if (gt.get('0599b7221b7325d0ff37eb14b24bcba3')) {
        var trdChk = ['confirm_trade', 'put_trade_on_hold', 'resume_trade', 'settle_trade, process_trade_cancellation', 'trade_amend'];
        var flag = false;
        for (var i = 0; i < trdChk.length; i++) {
            if (gt.getValue(trdChk[i]) == true) {
                gs.info(trdChk[i]);
                flag = true;
                break;
            } else
                flag = false;
        }
        if (flag) {

            gs.info("Trade eligle to create a case record");

        } else
            gs.info("Trade not eligle to create a case record");

    }]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>45381533@hsbc.com</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-06-17 04:52:55</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>e4aae5961b7602106ed00e1ad34bcb10</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Check Business Process Outcome</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e4aae5961b7602106ed00e1ad34bcb10</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>45381533@hsbc.com</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-06-17 05:03:15</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
